text.author: Daniela Karine Ramos, Bruna Anastacio
text.title: The Use of Cognitive Digital Games in School: Contributions to Attention
text.summary: This study presents an experiment which demonstrates the efficacy of digital cognitive games for improving children's attention spans at school.
